title: Homeshopa Soap Filled Scourer Pads, 10 Pack Stain and Grease Cutting Scouring Scrubber Pads, Durable and Long Lasting, Steel Wool Cleaning Scrub for Hob Oven Kitchen Sink
features: REMOVES THE TOUGHEST MESS: Our scouring pads are designed to get rid of the toughest messes. Cleaning pots and pans is a joy with these steel-wool scouring pads. Whether you're cleaning burnt food from a stove or soap scum from a shower wall, they'll get the job done. The soap-filled pads will deliver the thorough scrubbing that is needed.

QUALITY MATERIAL: These cleaning scrubbing pads are made of steel wool material, which is resistant to rust, sturdy, and has a long service life. There is no corrosion, no bending, no breaking, or weakening, and they are very safe to use and work with.
PRE-SOAPED FOR YOUR EASY USE: Our steel wool scouring pads are pre-soaped and ready to use right out of the packaging. Because the pads are pre-soaped, the soap for your first few washes is on us.

REUSABLE: These soap pads can be used over and over again. Scrubber soap pads are perfect for cleaning cast iron and stainless steel pots and pans. Also ideal for use outside, such as cleaning your BBQ griddle.

SCRUB AND CLEAN WITH EASE: The soap filled pads can be used for a variety of chores both inside and outside the home. Scrub baking dishes, pots, pans, and utensils with institutional soap pads! With ease, cut through grease and filth. Perfect for restaurants, industrial and commercial kitchens, and cafeterias!
